Hi All, 

It works fine. 
Steps:
1. Install as a trail version first.
2. Start the tool.
3. register with the any of the following keys

712C-0211-TY4B-VNCR-BVBB-ENDP
712C-0211-GPCA-ZH4W-FDZ9-0NTG
712C-0211-TW6F-ZMCZ-FVDD-8X9J
712C-0211-TZ5E-ZM5Y-DVV9-EK9G


4. add this line to your HOSTS file (usually located in the /windows/system32/drivers/etc folder):
127.0.0.1	tools.bvrp.com

5. Restart the Machine. 
6. start the tool, no issues :-)

Enjoy
